programme.title: Clinton's foreign policy issues
programme.short_synopsis: In less than a year, Clinton has been confronted by a flood of foreign disasters.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines some of the foreign policy issues that the Clinton administration has found itself involved in, less than a year into his presidency.
